body:
If for whatever reason any of you want to see the ass head shit stain suffer for his actions against the short dude... 

Well...you can read it here... 👇

https://archiveofourown.org/works/33892285/chapters/85086265
Dead brain.
This is such a disappointment compared to the first two chapters

the usual cajoles aside ,the ugly duckling really gets off from punishing the short dude.Dude's insecurity playing the dominant role in his metamorphosis .Wonder what the checkered past had has been .Girl's just a doormat
RIP for limp dick mc.
Will there be part 4 ? will there be another gigachad to steal girl from current chad ?

@Papertowel best statement so far
.also the plot is shit even for an ntr....felt like i lose some of my braincell reading it...should just focus jerking off to the art and call it a day

Wait what... her dad is the manager of a company who's in debt and the dudes dad is the president of a company that buys/sell stuff to that company. Then he tells her he "might" be able to help the company the dad works at and she just instantly spreads her legs? Like WTF it's not even your family thats in debt, sure the dad might lose his job since the company goes bankrupt, but even so he only promised he might help the company and you have no idea even if that order would even help in the first place.... dang I am gettin to stuck on how stupid the plot are....
NTRfags complaining about vanillafags complaining or just people pointing out dumb shit in NTR, complainception.
Finally time to dig in!
No new still no part 4 what a waste..
Vanilla readers complaining but in reality they fap to this as well

Ohhh Lmao, actually mate, your comment wasn't near at bitchy comment at all, your were just trying to say that the artist knows his/her target readers(if I remember it right) , what I meant when I say bitchy comment is a comment like the guy below my comment that you replied on.

@Prf.NTR LMAO actually the only reason i left that comment was because i read your comment and it felt like you were daring me to leave a bitchy comment, anyway i know i'm stupid and i should behave myself, so now that i have had a little giggle from it i have deleted it. Ok mate no hard feelings.
I was wrong about "Vanillafags can read and leave without leaving bitchy comment"....-_-

this dumbass didn't use his brain, didn't he know how much he can do with that video of them having sex. Instead of jerking off he should've send it to news outlet all over the country, spread it around that school, give it to ayaka parents. Even big company like samsung would take a hit because of scandal like this, even if that bald dumbass torment your family  or kill you for it, Japan has serious social punishment for someone in scandal, they would ostracize and outright shame them in public . do something rather then whining all the time
@Aldyn facts

Holy shit, this bully sounds insecure as fuck. It's like he's trying to compensate for something. "How does it feel to get fucked by the guy who bullied Kouta?" LMAO. Nothing unusual by NTR standards, though.
They better not make a part 4

It’s eh. The first half feels forced because the girl needlessly backtracks from having a realistic level of IQ. She’s still 10x better than her friend who went along with anything for the coom but guess her level of maturity felt out of place in something as generic as this.
Well I don’t really like ntr but common, at least come with something original because it’s getting boring
Damn this shit again, waiting for comments battle 😂
What's utaha doing in here?
Wonder is there will be a chapter 4
*passes salt* *equips butter*

Hey hey, actually it's not that bad ( well it's never been bad), the art is just right as decent, the plot might be generic but it keeps it's tone as a simple fap material. This is the kind of doujin that even vanilla fans can read it and leave without leaving a bitchy comment.
*grabs popcorn*
Me in my thoughts: *saw the title* "Child hood friend" , Ferb looks like we're going to do the same thing today.
Waiting for vanilla cucks to complain on this one
